caption.p: Reduced virus titers of LPAIV and HPAIV in NLRC5 KD chicken macrophages. MQ-NCSU cells were transfected with NLRC5 siRNA or non-specific control siRNA (scramble) and infected with H5N2, H7N2 or H5N1 at 32 hpt. NLRC5 mRNA and viral RNA were quantified by qRT-PCR. (A) NLRC5 mRNA levels were measured at 32 hpt and compared to control. Viral RNA levels were measured by M-gene amplification at 8 and 24 hpi with (B) H5N2 and (C) H5N1. Supernatant infectious virus production was measured using relative equivalence units (REUs) at 8 and 24 hpi with (D) H5N2 or (E) H7N2. Data represents average of three biological replicates with error bars showing standard deviation. * p ≤ 0.05, ** p ≤ 0.01.
